resources.string:
A little explanation

If one of lib64 or lib already exists

No need to continue 

Can return to the connection server 


This app is based on lan-play

So you need root privileges

Tap to grant root privileges and continue

This app is based on lan-play

 Address: https://github.com/spacemeowx2/switch-lan-play

 I do not provide any server

 has a problem? Visit the link below
 https://github.com/liuzhushaonian/LanPlayAndoird/blob/master/QUEST.md

This operation is used to delete the lib dependencies placed under system


If you want to uninstall this app


Then do this operation


Lan-play will not work properly after relying on deletion


Of course you can reconfigure dependencies on the configuration page
Configuration failed, please check the log for reason
Initializing the network card, please grant root privileges and wait a moment~
An error has occurred, please check the log or use the full root. Please do not use the root of the development version of the Xiaomi mobile phone.
Please set the network card on the modification page.
